Title: Black Widow
Writer: Ned Benson (screenplay), Don Heck (comic book & character), Stan Lee (characters), Stan Lee (comic book & character), Don Rico (comic book & character), Jac Schaeffer (screenplay)
Actors: Florence Pugh, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr., David Harbour
Plot: A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.
